entity.name: Hong Kong declares coronavirus outbreak an 'emergency'
entity.description: The city’s leader, Carrie Lam, also extended school holidays until February 17, suspended official visits to mainland China and said this year’s Hong Kong Marathon would not take place.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in New Zealand
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information about the COVID-19 situation from the government, health authorities and other trusted sources across New Zealand. For more, visit https://covid19.govt.nz/.

text:
@realDonaldTrump Death-count 4/12/20 in countries that took prompt aggressive action:
S. Korea: 214
Japan: 108
Hong Kong: 4
Taiwan: 6
NZ: 4

The US where Trump called coronavirus a hoax & ignored it for 70 days, now faces huge deficit of ventilators/masks/PPEs:
US Death Toll From COVID-19: 20,580
